meanings.definition: A female compatriot or fellow countrywoman.
meanings.sent1: My paisana Maria always celebrates our national holidays with me.
meanings.sent2: I met my paisana at the embassy event for citizens living abroad.
meanings.sent3: When we both wore our country's flag as capes, everyone thought we were superheroes!
meanings.sent4: She stood by me like a true paisana during the difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The bond between paisanas is unbreakable, like a chain of unity.

meanings.sent1: My paisana from work invited me to her birthday party.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy catching up with my paisana over coffee.
meanings.sent3: We laughed so hard at the silly movie, my paisana almost spilled her drink!
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like a beacon of light, my paisana guiding me through tough decisions.
meanings.sent5: A loyal paisana is a treasure beyond measure, a friend for life.

meanings.definition: A woman from the same town or region.
meanings.sent1: The festival was a great opportunity to meet other paisanas from our area.
meanings.sent2: I bumped into my paisana at the local market while shopping for fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: We both showed up wearing the traditional dress, unintentional paisana twins!
meanings.sent4: In a sea of strangers, spotting a paisana feels like finding a familiar shore.
meanings.sent5: The bond between paisanas from our hometown is like a thread connecting us to our roots.
